website_summaries.verdict: Athletic-fit, pullover jacket with front half-zipper, a crossover style between sports and social activities.
pros: Stretch fleece panels under the arms and down the sides provide for increased mobility
Brushed microfiber inner collar, front reverse coil half-zipper
Mid-weight sweater knit provides warmth and comfort
Available in 5 colors, all contrasting with black side panels
cons: Great, quality-made jacket, but some may not like the half-zipper style — makes putting on and taking off more difficult

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for myself. If you can get it for the $60 range that I did...jump on it! I see these for $99+ all the time on other sites or in the retail stores (if you can ever find them). The material is extremely well made. It's warm and the fit is perfect. I am 5' 8", 150lbs and this just right for me. The design is unique and I get a lot of compliments/questions about it.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweater
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater. The best pullover I own. As a matter of fact, liked it so much I bought three, black, white, blue. I bought them for snow skiing but wear them playing golf and just out on the town. Fit is perfect. Wears great. Very comfortable. Hope this helps Mike
customer_reviews.author: azwilli

customer_reviews.title: I got lucky
customer_reviews.text: I had tried this sweater on at EMS and liked it, but did not want to pay what they where asking. I was fortunate because I found it on sale and in this unique camo color. It filled my mid layer need perfectly, as worn with 180 Merino base, and shell. I run hot and had to ditch my primaloft lightweight mid for a wool sweater, which worked but was a bit bulky. I can recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband looks so good in this! He needed a new sweatshirt or jacket to wear at work with his scrubs because his office gets cold and this fit the bill. I told him to get rid of any other jacket/sweaters because he looks so handsome in this. It’s a nice quality and just fits well. We would absolutely buy it again and other items from this company.
customer_reviews.author: User Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Warm and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Warm and stylish. Love this great fitting spyder for when the temps drop in the Midwest. It is more form fitting or tailored than a regular cut so beware when purchasing. I bought tts and it fits great with a little restriction in my lats.
customer_reviews.author: Seth R

customer_reviews.title: Husband looked stupid sexy in this
customer_reviews.text: Although Spyder always kills my bank account, my husband looks amazing in this jacket. He wears it all the time. Great gift for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, color is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, color is awesome. Have wanted one of these for a while. Note: it does get pretty warm, so if you're wearing it for fashion, or to the office, you will notice it. Perfect for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: BJ C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. He is 6' tall and it fits great and looks good too. He wears it quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Provided you have a slender physique, this is particular garment is high quality and exceptionally comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tribal Elder

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater
customer_reviews.text: Side fabric keep you from overheating as the knitted fabric retained heat. Allows for a wide swing in temperatures without sacrificing comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Downard

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Great quality and looked great on my son. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: kwakpac

customer_reviews.title: Favorite jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking about sending it back. But after I got it I couldn't bring myself to it. I love this jacket and the only thing it needs is pockets
customer_reviews.author: Brenden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket. A large fits me very well athletic build, 6'4"
customer_reviews.author: stevalsky

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the color is unique and very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Green Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Spyder Men's Outbound Novelty Mid Weight Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was purchased as a gift. The recipient was very pleased with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lacygirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lounging, but no pockets
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Very comfortable. Have used it a bunch and the only negative is that it doesn't have pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and neat
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and it keeps him warm in cooler days.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for ski vacations!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on many ski vacations since receiving and it is great. Fit exactly as expected. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Best sweaters ever.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these now. Use for work, casual and of course skiing. Great product. Hope they keep making these.
customer_reviews.author: Hussein M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my father. He is a hunter. He likes to wear it even when not hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Typical Spyder Jacket - Fun Color
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple other of these jackets. I don't ski anymore but they are warm for late fall and early spring. The camo design is just different from what you usually see that it fits in well in the upper mid-west.
customer_reviews.author: Mpls Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and great look! Quality is excellent! Getting two more for Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: Karen F

product_meta.title: Spyder Men's Outbound Novelty Mid Weight Stryke Jacket
product_meta.description: Spyder is one of the largest winter sports brands in the world, as well as an official supplier to the U.S. Ski and Canadian alpine teams. Spyder apparel integrates high-technology fabrication, sport-specific function, and fashion conscious designs. Based in Boulder, co, the company sells high performance Sportswear in the United States, Canada, and more than 50 countries worldwide.
feature_bullets: Stretch fleece panels at Underarm and side body
